tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_types (
    type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE industries (
    industry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    industry_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_type VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_generation (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type_id INT,
    industry_id INT,
    quantity FLOAT,
    date_generated DATE
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal (
    disposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    disposal_location VARCHAR(255),
    disposal_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste (
    hazardous_waste_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    industry_id INT NOT NULL,
    waste_type_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_industry FOREIGN KEY (industry_id) REFERENCES industries(industry_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_waste_type FOREIGN KEY (waste_type_id) REFERENCES waste_types(waste_type_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_generation (
    generation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    hazardous_waste_id INT NOT NULL,
    generation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    generation_quantity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_hazardous_waste FOREIGN KEY (hazardous_waste_id) REFERENCES hazardous_waste(hazardous_waste_id)
);
